dares: Sing the chorus of your favorite song in public.
Do 20 push-ups.
Call a friend and speak in a funny accent for 5 minutes.
Take a selfie with a stranger.
Eat a spoonful of hot sauce.
Do a cartwheel in a public place.
Ask a stranger for a piggyback ride.
Dance like nobody's watching for one minute.
Wear your clothes backward for the next hour.
Send a text to your crush saying you like them (or a friend if you're single).
Speak only in rhyme for the next 10 minutes.
Wear socks on your hands for the next 30 minutes.
Do the chicken dance in a crowded area.
Take a funny selfie with a random object in public.
Balance a spoon on your nose for one minute.
Do your best impression of a celebrity.
Give a heartfelt compliment to the next person you see.
Tell a joke to a stranger.
Do a handstand against a wall for 30 seconds.
Let someone give you a makeover with whatever makeup they have.
Eat a piece of fruit without using your hands.
Try to breakdance for one minute.
Text your parents saying you're dropping out of school (or a fake scenario if you're not in school).
Speak in a whisper for the next 15 minutes.
Do a plank for as long as you can.
Wear a silly hat for the rest of the day.
Jump in place 50 times.
Do your best impression of a famous cartoon character.
Give a high-five to a stranger.
Go outside and do your best chicken impression.
Eat a spoonful of mustard.
Sing a nursery rhyme in an opera voice.
Wear a sign that says 'Free Hugs' for 15 minutes.
Speak in a foreign accent for the next hour.
Take a selfie with a statue or monument.
Do a silly dance in the middle of a crowded area.
Recite the alphabet backward.
Do a round of the Macarena in public.
Let someone draw a mustache on your face with a marker.
Attempt to juggle three random objects for one minute.
Do 10 jumping jacks.
Find a random stranger and give them a high-five.
Do your best impersonation of a famous movie character.
Eat a spoonful of peanut butter without water.
Talk to a houseplant as if it were a long-lost friend.
Wear socks on your hands and try to type a message.
Go to a store and ask for a product that doesn't exist.
Do a victory dance for no reason.
Try to touch your nose with your tongue.
Compliment a stranger's shoes.
Walk backward for the next 5 minutes.
Wear your clothes inside out for the next hour.
Do an interpretive dance to your favorite song.
Draw a funny face on your stomach and show it to someone.
Try to hula hoop for one minute.
Walk up to a random person and tell them a joke.
Do a handstand and sing the national anthem.
Wear sunglasses indoors for the next 30 minutes.
Do a silly walk down the street.
Put on a funny costume and take a stroll around your neighborhood.
Start a conversation with a stranger by complimenting their hair.
Eat a raw onion slice.
Try to break an egg with one hand.
Recite a tongue twister five times without making a mistake.
Take a selfie with a dog (with the owner's permission, of course).
Do your best impression of a famous meme.
Try to do a backflip (safely!) on a trampoline or soft surface.
Wear mismatched shoes for the next hour.
Find a street performer and join in their act for a minute.
Talk to a random object like it's a close friend.
Hold a plank position for two minutes.
Wear a funny hat and sing a silly song in public.
Try to touch your toes without bending your knees.
Start a dance party in a public place.
Recite a poem about bananas in a dramatic voice.
Wear a sign that says 'Ask me for a joke' and tell jokes to people who approach you.

Try to lick your elbow.

Do your best impression of a robot.
